data.actual_result: The mini window just appears in the middle with a black background
data.expected_result: The grey background should fill to the edges of the screen
data.short_description: [macOS] Dragging the mini loading window to create a new window in Mission Control will show a black background around the central animation and text
data.steps_to_repro: - Close and reopen Discord so that the mini loading window shows - Open Mission Control - Drag the mini window to the top and hold, so that it becomes full-screen - Click on it at the top and observe
